parameters.name: HostAccountId
parameters.description:
The ID of the host account whose information you want to modify.

> You can call the [ListHostAccounts](~~204372~~) operation to query the ID of the host account.

parameters.name: HostAccountName
parameters.description: The new name of the host account. The name can be up to 128 characters in length.

parameters.name: HostShareKeyId
parameters.description:
The ID of the shared key that is associated with the host.

>  You can call the [ListHostShareKeys](~~462973~~) operation to query the shared key ID.

parameters.name: InstanceId
parameters.description:
The ID of the bastion host in which you want to modify the information about the host account.

> You can call the [DescribeInstances](~~153281~~) operation to query the ID of the bastion host.

parameters.name: PassPhrase
parameters.description:
The passphrase for the new private key of the host account.

>  This parameter is valid only if the protocol used by the host is SSH. You do not need to configure this parameter if the protocol used by the host is Remote Desktop Protocol (RDP).

parameters.name: Password
parameters.description: The new password of the host account.

parameters.name: PrivateKey
parameters.description:
The new private key of the host account. Specify a Base64-encoded string.

>  This parameter takes effect only if the protocol used by the host is SSH. You do not need to configure this parameter if the protocol used by the host is Remote Desktop Protocol (RDP). You can call the [GetHostAccount](~~204391~~) operation to query the protocol used by the host. You can configure a password and a private key for the host account at the same time. If both a password and a private key are configured for the host account, Bastionhost preferentially uses the private key for logon.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description:
The region ID of the bastion host in which you want to query the details of the host account.

> For more information about the mapping between region IDs and region names, see [Regions and zones](~~40654~~).
